47#ifndef __sockpp_raw_socket_h
48#define __sockpp_raw_socket_h
49
50#include "sockpp/socket.h"
51
52namespace sockpp {
53
55
59class raw_socket : public socket
60{
62 using base = socket;
63
64 // Non-copyable
65 raw_socket(const raw_socket&) = delete;
66 raw_socket& operator=(const raw_socket&) = delete;
67
68protected:
74 static result<socket_t> create_handle(int domain, int protocol = 0) {
75 return check_socket(socket_t(::socket(domain, COMM_TYPE, protocol)));
76 }
77
78public:
80 static constexpr int COMM_TYPE = SOCK_RAW;
81
85 raw_socket() noexcept {}
91 explicit raw_socket(socket_t handle) noexcept : base(handle) {}
96 raw_socket(raw_socket&& other) noexcept : base(std::move(other)) {}
102 raw_socket& operator=(raw_socket&& rhs) noexcept {
103 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
104 return *this;
105 }
116 raw_socket clone() const {
117 auto h = base::clone().release();
118 return raw_socket(h);
119 }
129 result<> connect(const sock_address& addr) {
130 return check_res_none(::connect(handle(), addr.sockaddr_ptr(), addr.size()));
131 }
132};
133
135
142template <typename ADDR>
143class raw_socket_tmpl : public raw_socket
144{
146 using base = raw_socket;
147
148public:
150 static constexpr sa_family_t ADDRESS_FAMILY = ADDR::ADDRESS_FAMILY;
152 using addr_t = ADDR;
153
159 raw_socket_tmpl() noexcept {}
165 raw_socket_tmpl(socket_t handle) noexcept : base(handle) {}
170 raw_socket_tmpl(const ADDR& addr) : base(addr) {}
176 raw_socket_tmpl(raw_socket&& sock) : base(std::move(sock)) {}
181 raw_socket_tmpl(raw_socket_tmpl&& other) : base(std::move(other)) {}
187 raw_socket_tmpl& operator=(raw_socket_tmpl&& rhs) {
188 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
189 return *this;
190 }
203 static std::tuple<raw_socket_tmpl, raw_socket_tmpl> pair(int protocol = 0) {
204 auto pr = base::pair(addr_t::ADDRESS_FAMILY, COMM_TYPE, protocol);
205 return std::make_tuple<raw_socket_tmpl, raw_socket_tmpl>(
206 raw_socket_tmpl{std::get<0>(pr).release()},
207 raw_socket_tmpl{std::get<1>(pr).release()}
208 );
209 }
217 result<> bind(const ADDR& addr) { return base::bind(addr); }
227 result<> connect(const ADDR& addr) { return base::connect(addr); }
228
229 // ----- I/O -----
230
239 result<size_t> send_to(const void* buf, size_t n, int flags, const ADDR& addr) {
240 return base::send_to(buf, n, flags, addr);
241 }
249 result<size_t> send_to(const std::string& s, int flags, const ADDR& addr) {
250 return base::send_to(s, flags, addr);
251 }
259 result<size_t> send_to(const void* buf, size_t n, const ADDR& addr) {
260 return base::send_to(buf, n, 0, addr);
261 }
268 result<size_t> send_to(const std::string& s, const ADDR& addr) {
269 return base::send_to(s, addr);
270 }
280 result<size_t> recv_from(void* buf, size_t n, int flags, ADDR* srcAddr) {
281 return base::recv_from(buf, n, flags, srcAddr);
282 }
291 result<size_t> recv_from(void* buf, size_t n, ADDR* srcAddr = nullptr) {
292 return base::recv_from(buf, n, srcAddr);
293 }
294};
295
297} // namespace sockpp
298
299#endif // __sockpp_raw_socket_h
